data.name: Moon VR Video Player
data.detailed_description:
Moon VR Video Player is a powerful and easy to use VR video player. Moon VR Video player will give you an elegant and simple VR experience. Superb UI, excellent stability, clear file path, comprehensive format support, these are the Moon VR Video Player users’ favorite. Download with Moon VR Video Player, make your VR experience smooth and happy every moment.

Advantages over other VR players

  • Automatically show your new videos, so you don't have to choose the file path again and again
  • Automatically recognized the correct play format, no longer need to manually set the video format
  • Powerful decoding, even supports smooth playback of 8K/90mbs video
  • Simple and easy to use interface
  • Exclusive optimization for some wrong format VR video, to enhance the 3D stereo effect, reduce the screen ghosting and dizziness

Features

  • Support HTC VIVE, Oculus Rift, Microsoft MR
  • Support external subtitles
  • Support audio track selection
  • Automatically identify video types
  • Collections of folders and individual videos
  • Unconventional 3D/VR video source repair (left and right eye swap, mirror reversal, Removing ghosting blur)
  • Adjust screen Size, Distance, Brightness
  • Adjust aspect ratio of the video
  • Adjust 180° 360° video FOV

Format support

  • Video format: MP4, AVI, RMVB, MPEG, WMV, MKV, MOV, FLV, 3GP, WebM, TS, 3G2, 3GP2, 3GPP, AMV, ASF, DIVX, DV, EVO, F4V, HDMOV, M1V, M2T, M2TS, M4V, MK3D, MOD, MP4V, MPG, MPV2, MPV4, MTS, MXF, OGM, OGV, P2V, RM, TP, VOB
  • Video types: 2D, 3D, 180°, 360°, 3D Side-By-Side (SBS), 3D Over-Under (OU)
  • Subtitle format: SRT, ASS, SSA，VTT
  • Audio format: AC3, DTS

Upcoming Features

  • Head control mode and Keyboard/Mouse control mode
  • Cool Curved screen
  • Track subtitle fine tuning

If you have any problem or suggestions when using Moon VR Video Player , please contact us:
Official Email: info@rockvr.com
Official QQ Group: 602352683

data.short_description: Moon VR Video Player is a powerful and easy to use VR video player. Moon VR Video player will give you an elegant and simple VR experience. Superb UI, excellent stability, clear file path, comprehensive format support, these are the Moon VR Video Player users’ favorite.
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, German, French

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-3770 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
